price: Àti ìjọ Nūh tí ó ṣíwájú (wọn), dájúdájú wọ́n jẹ́ ìjọ arúfin.
arabic: وَقَوۡمَ نُوحٖ مِّن قَبۡلُۖ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waqawma nūḥin min qablu innahum kānū qawman fāsiqīna
